title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-3.2 - Determination of educational policy by the commissioner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-3.2 - Determination of educational policy by the commissioner

State Regulations

Where not otherwise governed or controlled by statute or
by this Part, issues of educational policy relating to higher education student
financial aid programs shall be determined in accordance with the judgment of
the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
145-3.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
